definition: dry measure for grain equal to ten dou 斗/ten pecks/one hundred liters
rock/stone/stone inscription/one of the eight categories of ancient musical instruments 八音[ba1 yin1]
silicosis (occupational disease of miners)/grinder's disease/also written 矽末病

sentences.english: Nay. It was the climax of the lapidary 's skill.
sentences.chinese: 这是宝石匠技术高超的表演。

sentences.english: Build a quarry and then a stonemason.
These spectacular structures (see Fig. 1.8) carried the art and engineering of working in stone to its highest level.
sentences.chinese: 这些壮观的建筑达到了石匠工艺的最高水平。

sentences.english: The man to whom it was committed was one of the most skillful lapidaries in the world.
sentences.chinese: 英皇所委讬的这人，是世上宝石匠中的第一名手。

sentences.english: Lucius got apprenticed to a stonemason.
sentences.chinese: 卢修斯成了石匠的学徒。

sentences.english: Jin Yue is foster daughter, marry two years ago profit of overhead of village manson Zhao.
sentences.chinese: 金月是养女，两年前嫁给村里石匠赵天利。

sentences.english: It took three stonemasons 14 years to create and complete.
sentences.chinese: 此柱由3个石匠花了14年的时间创造并完成。

sentences.english: " The wise man, humoring him, said, "Be a cutter.
sentences.chinese: 智者纵容着他说，“去做采石匠吧。”

sentences.english: The stonemasons were wroth with her, it seemed. The bricklayers as well.
sentences.chinese: 看起来石匠们也对她怒目相视，而砖匠们也一样。

sentences.english: It was the climax of the lapidary's skill.
sentences.chinese: 这是宝石匠技术高超的表演。

sentences.english: He was a renowned stonemason in the mountain villages, who was a man as solidly built as a stone.
sentences.chinese: 他是山乡十里方园内有名的石匠，身体结实得像石头。

sentences.english: A old masons, accidentally get a magic stone.
sentences.chinese: 有一个年迈的石匠，意外地获得了一块魔石。

sentences.english: After he had made his selection , the stonecutter asked him what inscription he would like on it.
sentences.chinese: 他选好了以后，石匠问他，要在墓碑上刻什么碑铭。

sentences.english: With over 60 years' of experience, the old stonecutter has outstanding workmanship.
sentences.chinese: 老石匠的手艺很棒，积累了60多年的丰富经验。

sentences.english: There was once a skilled mason. A master at dressing stone.
sentences.chinese: 很久以前有一个技艺高超的石匠，一位磨石大师。

definition: hooped barrel/to handmake a wooden barrel
to help with farm work/casual laborer
